<TD WIDTH="82%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:82.5%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:17.5%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	h)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="82%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:82.5%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	The election, removal or fixing of the compensation of the Chairman of the Board, the Chief Executive Officer or the President.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	The Board may, by resolution, fix the regular meeting date of the executive committee, and notice of any such regular meeting date shall be dispensed with.&#160; Special meetings of the executive committee may be held at the principal office of the corporation, or at any place which has been designated from time to time by resolution of the executive committee or by written consent of all members thereof and may be called by the Chairman of the Board, the president, any Vice president who is a member of the executive committee, or any two members thereof, upon written notice to the members of the executive committee of the time and place of such special meeting given in the manner provided for the giving of written notice to members of the Board of the time and place of special meetings of the Board.&#160; Vacancies in the membership of the executive committee nay be filled by the Board.&#160; A majority of the authorized number of members of the executive committee shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business; and transactions of any meeting of the executive committee, however, called and noticed, or wherever held, shall be as valid as though at a meeting duly held after regular call and notice, if a quorum is present and if, either before or after the meeting, each of the members not present signs a written waiver of notice or a consent to holding such meeting or an approval of the minutes thereof.&#160; All such waivers, consents or approvals shall be filed with the corporation&#146;s records or made a part of the minutes of the meeting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Any action required or permitted to be taken by the executive committee may be taken without a meeting, if all members of the executive committee shall individually or collectively consent in writing to such action.&#160; Such written consent or consents shall be filed with the minutes of the proceedings of the executive committee.&#160; Such action by written consent shall have the same force and effect as a unanimous vote of such members of the executive committee.&#160; Any certificate or other document
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="2",CHK=268917,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-KE-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 08:51 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage12"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	filed under any provision of the General Corporation Law which relates to action so taken shall state that the action was taken by unanimous written consent of the executive committee without meeting, and that these Bylaws authorize the members of the executive committee to so act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;6.2&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Committees
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The Board may, but shall not be required to, designate any other committee consisting of two or more directors, to serve at the pleasure of the Board.&#160; Any such committee shall possess such powers of the Board as the Board shall by its resolution provide, except that it shall not in any event have authority with respect to any of the transactions which are prohibited to the executive committee by
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.1
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Unless the Board shall otherwise prescribe the manner of proceedings of any other committee, meetings of such committee may be regularly scheduled in advance and may be called at any time by the Chairman of the Board, or the President, or any two members of the committee; otherwise, the provisions of these Bylaws with respect to notice and conduct of meetings of the Board shall govern.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;VII.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RECORDS AND REPORTS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;7.1&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Records
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The corporation shall maintain adequate and correct books and records of account of its business and properties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;7.2&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Checks and Drafts
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; All checks, drafts and other orders for payment of money, notes or other evidences of indebtedness, issued in the name of or payable to the corporation, shall be signed or endorsed by such person or persons and in such manner as shall be determined from time to time by resolution of the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;7.3&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Execution of Instruments
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The Board may authorize any officer or officers or agent or agents to enter into any contract or execute any instrument in the name of and on behalf of the corporation.&#160; Such authority may be general or confined to specific instances.&#160; Unless so authorized by the Board, no officer, agent or employee shall have any power or to pledge its credit, or to render it liable for any purpose or for any amount.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;7.4&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiscal Year
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The fiscal year of the corporation shall be a December&nbsp;31 fiscal year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;7.5&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Annual Audit
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The corporation shall be subject to an annual audit as of the end of its fiscal year by independent public accountants appointed by, and responsible to, the Board.&#160; The appointment of such accountants shall be subject to annual ratification by the stockholders.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="2",CHK=535453,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-KE-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 08:51 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;VIII.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	DIVIDENDS ON STOCK
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;8.1&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Dividends on Stock
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; Subject to applicable law, the certificate of incorporation and these Bylaws, the Board may, from time to time, declare, and the corporation may pay, dividends on the outstanding shares of capitol stock of the corporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;IX.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SHARES; CERTIFICATES
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.1&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Issuance
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The corporation, as authorized by the Board, may issue shares in uncertificated form and may also issue any and all forms of certificates of stock not inconsistent with law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.2&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Certificates for Shares
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; Every holder of shares of the stock of the corporation or shares of any other class or series of stock that may be validly authorized and issued by the corporation shall be entitled to have a certificate signed in the name of the corporation by the Chairman of the Board or the President or a Vice President and by the Treasurer or an Assistant Treasurer or the Secretary or an Assistant Secretory, certifying the number of shares and the class or series of shares owned by the stockholder.&#160; Any of the signatures on the certificate may be a facsimile.&#160; In case any officer, transfer agent or registrar who has signed or whose facsimile signature has been placed upon a certificate shall have ceased to be such officer, transfer agent or registrar before such certificate is issued, it may be issued by the corporation with the same effect as if such person were an officer, transfer agent or registrar at the date of issue.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.3&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Statements on Certificates
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; Any certificates for shares of stock shall contain such legend or other statement as may be required by law or applicable rule&nbsp;or regulation, by these Bylaws or by any agreements between the corporation and the issuee thereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.4&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Lost or Destroyed Certificates
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; In case any certificate for stock or other security issued by this corporation is lost or destroyed, the Board may authorize the issuance of a new certificate or instrument therefor, on such terms and conditions as it may determine, after proof of such loss or destruction satisfactory to the Board.&#160; The Board may require a bond or other security in an adequate amount as indemnity for any such certificate or instrument when, in the Board&#146;s judgment, it is proper to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.5&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transfer
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; Stock of the corporation shall be transferable on the books of the corporation by the person named in the certificate, or by the person entitled thereto, on surrender, in the case of shares issued in certificated form,&#160; of the certificate for cancellation, accompanied by proper evidence of succession, assignment or authority to transfer.&#160; The corporation shall be entitled to treat the holder of record of any stock certificate as owner thereof, and, accordingly, shall not be bound to recognize
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="2",CHK=106998,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-KE-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 08:51 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage14"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	any equitable or other claim to, or interest In, such stock on the part of any other person, whether or not It shall have express or other notice thereof, save as expressly provided by the laws of the State of Delaware.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;9.6
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160; Shares To Be Issued In Uncertificated Form.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Except as otherwise provided in a resolution of the Board of Directors, all shares of the corporation shall be uncertificated shares beginning on January&nbsp;1, 2008. Nothwithstanding the foregoing, shares represented by a certificate issued prior to January&nbsp;1. 2008, shall be certificated shares until such certificate is surrendered to this corporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;X.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MISCELLANEOUS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;10.1&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Record Date
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	10.1.1&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Stockholders Meetings
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	.&#160; In order that the corporation may determine the stockholders entitled to notice of or to vote at any meeting of stockholders or adjournment thereof, the Board may fix, in advance, a record date, which shall not be more than 60 nor less than 10 days before the date of such meeting.&#160; A determination of stockholders of record entitled to notice of or to vote at a meeting of stockholders shall apply to any adjournment of the meeting; providing, however, that the Board may fix a new record date for the adjourned meeting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	10.1.2&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Other Actions
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	.&#160; In order that the corporation may determine the stockholders entitled to receive payment of any dividend or other distribution or allotment of any rights or the stockholders entitled to exercise any rights in respect of any change, conversion or exchange of stock, the Board may fix, in advance, a record date, which shall not be more than 60 days prior to such action.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	10.1.3&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	Subsequent Transfers and Closing Transfer Books
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	.&#160; When a record date is fixed, only stockholders of record at the close of business on that date are entitled to notice and to vote or to receive the dividend, distribution or allotment of rights or to exercise the rights, as the case may be, notwithstanding any transfer of any shares on the books of the corporation after the record date, except as otherwise provided in the certificate of incorporation or by agreement or in the General Corporation Law.&#160; The Board may close the books of the corporation against transfers of shares during the whole, or any part, of any such period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;10.2&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Inspection of Corporate Records
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	10.2.1&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	By Stockholders
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	.&#160; Any stockholder, in person or by attorney or other agent, shall, upon written demand under oath stating the purpose thereof, have the right during the usual hours of business to inspect for any proper purpose the corporation&#146;s stock ledger, a list of its stockholders, and its other books and records, and to make copies or extracts therefrom.&#160; A proper purpose shall mean a purpose reasonably related to such person&#146;s interest as a stockholder.&#160; In every instance where an attorney or other agent shall be the person who seeks the right to inspection, the
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=14,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="2",CHK=597847,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-KE-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 08:51 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage15"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	demand under oath shall be accompanied by a power of attorney or such other writing which authorizes the attorney or other agent to so act on behalf of the stockholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	10.2.2&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	By Directors
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	.&#160; Each director shall have the right at any reasonable time to inspect all books, records, documents of every kind, and the physical properties of the corporation.&#160; The inspection may be made in person or by agent or attorney, and the right of inspection includes the right to make extracts and copies thereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;10.3&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Corporate Seal
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&#160; The corporate seal of the corporation, if any, shall be in such form as the Board shall prescribe.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;XI.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AMENDMENT OF BYLAWS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	These Bylaws may be adopted, amended or repealed by the affirmative vote of the holders of at least two-thirds of the total votes eligible to be cast at a legal meeting of the stockholders or by a resolution adopted by a majority of the directors then in office.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
</EFX_BY-LAWS>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ADOPTION AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ESOP
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The undersigned adopting employer hereby adopts this Plan.&#160; The Plan is intended to qualify as a tax-exempt plan under Code sections 401(a)&nbsp;and 501(a), respectively.&#160; The ESOP Accounts of the Plan and the applicable portion of the Trust are also intended to qualify as a tax-exempt employee stock ownership plan and trust under Code section 4975(e)(7).&#160; The Plan shall consist of this Adoption Agreement, its related Basic Plan Document #CE2-ESOP and any related Appendix and Addendum to the Adoption Agreement.&#160; Unless otherwise indicated, all Section&nbsp;references are to Sections in the Basic Plan Document.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>

</B>

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Original effective date of Plan:
<U>
	January&nbsp;1, 1996
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; This is a restatement of a previously-adopted plan. Effective date of Plan restatement:
<U>
	January&nbsp;1, 2016
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The date specified in A.3a for a new plan may not be earlier than the first day of the Plan Year during which the Plan is adopted by the Plan Sponsor.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If A.3b is not selected, the Effective Date of the terms of this document shall be the date specified in A.3a. If A.3b is selected, the Effective Date of the restatement shall be the date specified in A.3b. However if the Adoption Agreement states another specific effective date for any Plan provision, when a provision of the Plan states another effective date, such stated specific effective date shall apply as to that provision.&#160; The date specified in A.3b for an amended and restated plan may not be earlier than the first day of the Plan Year during which the amended and restated Plan is adopted by the Plan Sponsor.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Plan Year
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Plan Year means each 12-consecutive month period ending on
<U>
	December&nbsp;31
</U>
	(e.g. December&nbsp;31)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The Plan has a short Plan Year. The short Plan Year begins
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
	&#160;and ends
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If A.5d is selected, the limitation year must be a consecutive 12-month period. This includes a fiscal year with an annual period varying from 52 to 53 weeks, so long as the fiscal year satisfies the requirements of Code section 441(f).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>

<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">

</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The Non-Elective Contribution Account shall constitute the ESOP Accounts of the Plan for purposes of:

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.

	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Investing in other investments types for diversification (Section&nbsp;1.02.)

</P>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If more than one ESOP Account is specified in A.7 and the Employer Stock to be allocated to ESOP Accounts is insufficient to fully fund the contributions to the ESOP Accounts, specify the ordering rule&nbsp;of the ESOP contributions made in the form of Employer Stock (Section&nbsp;4A.01(b)):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	Compensation

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Definition of Compensation for purposes of allocations:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; W-2.&#160; Wages within the meaning of Code section 3401(a)&nbsp;and all other payments of compensation paid to an Employee by the Employer (in the course of the Employer&#146;s trade or business) for which the Employer is required to furnish the Employee a written statement under Code sections 6041(d), 6051(a)(3), and 6052.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Withholding.&#160; Wages paid to an Employee by the Employer (in the course of the Employer&#146;s trade or business) within the meaning of Code section 3401(a)&nbsp;for the purposes of income tax withholding at the source.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-03_PB_2_031126_5335">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>

	&nbsp;

</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;A. GENERAL INFORMATION
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Section&nbsp;415 Safe Harbor Option.&#160; As described in the definition of &#147;Section&nbsp;415 Safe Harbor Option&#148; in Article&nbsp;2 of the Basic Plan Document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If &#147;415 Safe Harbor&#148; is selected, exclude amounts received during the year by an employee pursuant to a nonqualified unfunded deferred compensation plan to the extent includible in gross income:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Compensation is determined over the period specified below ending with or within the Plan Year:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; calendar year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Plan Sponsor Fiscal Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Limitation Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other twelve-month period beginning on:
<U>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</U>
	&#160;(enter month and day)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include deferrals in the definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	e.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include deemed Code section 125 compensation in the definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	f.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include differential military pay (as defined in Code section 3401(h)(2)) in the definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	g.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include other pay (not otherwise included in A.8a):
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A.8b must be &#147;Plan Year&#148; if the Plan is excluding compensation earned before entry (A.12 is selected).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If &#147;Plan Year&#148; is not selected in A.8b, for new/rehired Employees whose date of hire is less than 12 months before the end of the 12-month period designated, Compensation will be determined over the Plan Year.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If deferrals (A.8c) are selected, Compensation shall also include any amount which is contributed by the Employer pursuant to a salary reduction agreement and which is not includable in the gross income of the Employee under Code sections 125, 402(e)(3), 402(h), 403(b), 132(f)&nbsp;or 457. If the Plan uses the 415 Safe Harbor definition of Compensation (A.13a.iii is selected) and A.8c.i and/or A.8c.ii is not selected deferrals will not be included in Compensation for Non-Elective Contributions.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If deemed 125 Compensation (A.8e) is selected, Compensation shall include any amounts not available to a Participant in cash in lieu of group health coverage because the Participant is unable to certify that he or she has other health coverage. An amount will be treated as an amount under Code section 125 only if the Employer does not request or collect information regarding the Participant&#146;s other health coverage as part of the enrollment process for the health plan. This option is meant to be interpreted consistent with Revenue Ruling 2002-27 and any superseding guidance.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If A.8f is not selected and differential military pay exists, the payments will be included in Statutory Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If other pay (A.8g) is selected, A.8g should indicate for what purposes and which class of Participants the Compensation is included, must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Post Severance Compensation
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include Post Severance Compensation in definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A.9 will also apply for purposes of Statutory Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Post Year End Compensation
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Determine Compensation using Post Year End Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If selected, amounts earned during the current year and paid during the first few weeks of the next year will be included in current year Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A.10 will also apply for purposes of Statutory Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compensation Exclusions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Pay Before Participation
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude pay earned before participation in the Plan from definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If selected, Compensation shall include only that compensation which is actually paid to the Participant during that part of the Plan Year the Participant is eligible to participate in the Plan.&#160; If not selected, Compensation shall include that compensation which is actually paid to the Participant during the period specified in A.8b.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	414(s)&nbsp;Safe Harbor Alternative Definition
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude certain benefits from definition of Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If selected, Compensation shall exclude all of the following items (even if includable in gross income): reimbursements or other expense allowances, fringe benefits (cash and noncash), moving expenses, deferred compensation, and welfare benefits (Treas. Reg. section 1.414(s)-1(c)(3)).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	13.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Pay
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Exclude other pay from definition of Compensation for the following Participants:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Highly Compensated Employees only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-03_PB_3_032607_7056">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

</DIV>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=398432,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:30 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage20"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;A. GENERAL INFORMATION
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Participants
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Describe other pay excluded from definition of Compensation:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If All Participants (A.13a.iii) is selected, the definition of Compensation will not be a safe harbor definition within the meaning of Treas. Reg. 1.414(s)-1(c).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A.13b will only apply if A.13a.ii or iii is selected. A.14b should indicate for what purposes and which class of Participants the Compensation is excluded.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The pay specified above (A.13b) must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See Section&nbsp;4.01(c)&nbsp;for rules&nbsp;regarding elections for bonuses or other special pay.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Statutory Compensation
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Definition of Statutory Compensation:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; W-2.&#160; Wages within the meaning of Code section 3401(a)&nbsp;and all other payments of compensation paid to an Employee by the Employer (in the course of the Employer&#146;s trade or business) for which the Employer is required to furnish the Employee a written statement under Code sections 6041(d), 6051(a)(3), and 6052.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Withholding.&#160; Wages within the meaning of Code section 3401(a)&nbsp;for the purposes of income tax withholding at the source paid to the Employee by the Employer (in the course of the Employer&#146;s trade or business).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Section&nbsp;415 Safe Harbor Option.&#160; As described in the definition of &#147;Section&nbsp;415 Safe Harbor Option&#148; in Article&nbsp;2 of the Basic Plan Document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Include deemed Code section 125 compensation in definition of Statutory Compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See A.9 and A.10 to determine if Statutory Compensation will include Post Severance Compensation and/or be determined using Post Year End Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If A.8f is not selected and differential military pay exists, the payments will be included in Statutory Compensation.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Definitions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	15.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Highly Compensated Employee
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Use top-paid group election in determining Highly Compensated Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Use calendar year beginning with or within the preceding Plan Year in determining Highly Compensated Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A.15b will only apply if the Plan Year end in A.4a is not December&nbsp;31.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	16.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Disability
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Definition of Disability
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Under Code section 22(e). The Participant is unable to engage in any substantial gainful activity by reason of any medically determinable physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or which has lasted or can be expected to last for a continuous period of not less than 12 months. The permanence and degree of such impairment shall be supported by medical evidence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Under the Social Security Act. The determination by the Social Security Administration that the Participant is eligible to receive disability benefits under the Social Security Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Inability to engage in comparable occupation. The Participant suffers from a physical or mental impairment that results in his inability to engage in any occupation comparable to that in which the Participant was engaged at the time of his disability.&#160; The permanence and degree of such impairment shall be supported by medical evidence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Pursuant to other Employer Disability Plan. The Participant is eligible to receive benefits under a Employer-sponsored disability plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	e.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Under uniform rules&nbsp;established by the Plan Administrator. The Participant is mentally or physically disabled under a written nondiscriminatory policy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	f.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If A.16f is selected, provide the definition of Disability. The definition provided must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	17.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Choice of Law
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Name of state or commonwealth for choice of law (Section&nbsp;14.05):
<U>
	California
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;B. ELIGIBILITY
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exclusions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The term &#147;Eligible Employee&#148; shall not include (Check items B.1 - B.4 as appropriate):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-03_PB_4_040551_7056">
</A>
</P>

</DIV>
