<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=557885,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-03_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:30 2016' -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;B. ELIGIBILITY
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Union Employees&#160; Any Employee who is included in a unit of Employees covered by a collective bargaining agreement, if retirement benefits were the subject of good faith bargaining, and if the collective bargaining agreement does not provide for participation in this Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Any Leased Employee (as defined in Article&nbsp;2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non-Resident Aliens&#160; Any Employee who is a non-resident alien who received no earned income (within the meaning of Code section 911(d)(2)) which constitutes income from services performed within the United States (within the meaning of Code section 861(a)(3)).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Employees
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If selected, describe other excluded Employees from definition of Eligible Employee and indicate for what purposes, the Employees are excluded. The definition provided must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See Section&nbsp;3.04(a)&nbsp;for rules&nbsp;regarding excluded employees.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Opt-Out
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; An Employee may irrevocably elect not to participate in Plan pursuant to Treas. Reg. section 1.401(k)-1(a)(3)(v).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Eligibility Service Rules
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Employer Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Count years of service with employers other than the Employer for eligibility purposes. List other employers and indicate for what purposes the service applies along with any limitations:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Break in Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Rule&nbsp;of parity. Exclude eligibility service before a period of five (5)&nbsp;consecutive One-Year Breaks in Service/Periods of Severance if an Employee does not have any nonforfeitable right to the Account balance derived from Employer contributions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; One-year holdout. If an Employee has a One-Year Break in Service/Period of Severance, exclude eligibility service before such period until the Employee has completed a Year of Eligibility Service after returning to employment with the Employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The following modifications shall be made to the requirements specified in B.7a-b:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.7b applies for purposes of eligibility to receive Non-Elective Contributions only.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.7c could be used, for example, to require less than 500 hours of service (but not more than 500 hours) for a One-Year Break in Service under B.7a and/or B.7b, or to specify that the break in service rule(s)&nbsp;only apply to certain contributions.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Special Participation Date
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_62"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allow immediate participation for all Eligible Employees employed on a specific date. All Eligible Employees employed on
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	shall become eligible to participate in the Plan as of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The Plan provides conditions or limitations on immediate participation:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If B.8b applies (B.8a is selected) and is selected, describe the conditions or limitations and indicate for what purposes the conditions or limitations apply. The conditions/limitations must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Eligibility for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Age Requirement for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Minimum age requirement for Non-Elective Contributions:
<U>
	21
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Age 21 maximum; an age 26 maximum will apply instead if the Plan is maintained exclusively for employees of an educational institution (as defined in Code section 170(b)(1)(A)(ii)) by an employer which is exempt from tax under section 501(a)&nbsp;which provides that each Participant having at least 1 year of service has a right to 100 percent of his accrued benefit under the Plan which is nonforfeitable (within the meaning of section 411) at the time such benefit accrues.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Service Requirement for Non-Elective
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Minimum service requirement for Non-Elective Contributions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of one Year of Eligibility Service - Hours of Service necessary for a Year of Eligibility Service:
<U>
	1000
</U>
	(not to exceed 1,000)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of one Year of Eligibility Service - elapsed time
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of one and 1/2 Year of Eligibility Service - Hours of Service necessary for a Year of Eligibility Service:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(not to exceed 1,000). An Eligible Employee shall be deemed to earn 1/2 Year of Eligibility Service on the date that is six months after the end of the Eligibility Computation Period during which he earns his first Year of Eligibility Service; provided, that the individual is an Eligible Employee on the applicable entry date
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-05_PB_5_041025_7843">
</A>
</P>

	SECTION&nbsp;B. ELIGIBILITY
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of one and 1/2 Year of Eligibility Service - elapsed time
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	vi.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of two Years of Eligibility Service - Hours of Service necessary for one Year of Eligibility Service:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(not to exceed 1,000)
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	vii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of two Years of Eligibility Service - elapsed time
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	viii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Hours of Service (not to exceed 1,000) within a twelve month period. The service requirement shall be deemed met at the time the specified number of Hours of Service are completed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ix.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	months of service - elapsed time (not to exceed 24)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	x.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Hours of Service (not to exceed 1,000) in a
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	month period (not to exceed 12 - hours of service failsafe applies)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	xi.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Completion of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	consecutive months of continuous service (not to exceed 12 - hours of service failsafe applies)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	xii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(hours of service failsafe applies if elapsed time is not specified)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Months of service. If the service requirement is not met in the first consecutive period of months, describe the next service requirement:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Rolling. Each successive period shall begin immediately after the preceding period and shall end on or before the first Eligibility Computation Period after which time the Plan will revert to 1,000 Hours of Service in an Eligibility Computation Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Revert to 1,000 Hours of Service in an Eligibility Computation Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Service taken into account for purposes of B.10 shall be determined under the terms and conditions specified for determining a Year of Eligibility Service.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.10a cannot exceed 1 year, unless the Plan provides a nonforfeitable right to 100% of the Participant&#146;s Non-Elective Contribution Account balance after not more than 2 years of service, in which case up to 2 years is permitted.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If B.10a.vii is selected, the service requirements provided must comply with Code section 410(a), be definitely determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.10b only applies if B.10a.x or B.10a.xi is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Hours of service failsafe: if B.10a.x - B.10a.xii is selected and the Plan uses the Hours of Service method, the service requirement under B.10e Eligible Employee completes 1,000 Hours of Service; provided, that the individual is an Eligible Employee on the applicable entry date.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Additional Requirements for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Additional requirements, limitations, conditions or other modifications to B.9-10 (eligibility to receive allocations of Non-Elective Contributions) apply:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See Section&nbsp;3.04 for rules&nbsp;regarding eligibility requirements.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The additional requirements provided must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion and are subject to the same limits/requirements set out under options B.9-10.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Entry Dates for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Frequency of entry dates for Non-Elective Contributions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; immediate
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; first day of each calendar month
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; first day of each Plan quarter
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; first day of the first month and seventh month of the Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; first day of the Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	vi.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	An Eligible Employee shall become a Participant eligible to receive an allocation of Non-Elective Contributions on the entry date selected in B.12a that is:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; coincident with or next following the date the requirements of B.9 through B.11 are met
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; next following the date the requirements of B.9 through B.11 are met
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; coincident with or immediately preceding the date the requirements of B.9 through B.11 are met
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; immediately preceding the date the requirements of B.9 through B.11 are met
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; nearest to the date the requirements of B.9 through B.11 are met
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If immediate entry (B.12a.i) is selected, an Eligible Employee shall become a Participant eligible to receive an allocation of Non-Elective Contributions immediately upon meeting the requirements of B.9 through B.11.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.12b is not applicable if immediate or other (B.12a.i or B.12a.vi) is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The Plan must provide that an Eligible Employee who has attained age 21 and who has completed one Year of Eligibility Service (two Years of Eligibility Service may be used for contributions other than Elective Deferrals if the Plan provides a nonforfeitable right to 100% of the Participant&#146;s applicable Account balance after not more than 2 Years of Eligibility Service) shall commence participation in the Plan no later than the earlier of: (1)&nbsp;the first day of the first Plan Year beginning after the date on which such Eligible Employee satisfied such requirements; or (2)&nbsp;the date that is 6 months after the date on which he satisfied such requirements.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-05_PB_6_041149_7056">
</A>
</P>

	&nbsp;

</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;B. ELIGIBILITY
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Eligibility Service Computation Rules
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	13.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Eligibility Service Computation Rules
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Eligibility Computation Period switches to Plan Year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Select hours equivalency for eligibility purposes:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	An Employee shall be credited with the following service with the Employer:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 10 Hours of Service for each day or partial day
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 45 Hours of Service for each week or partial week
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 95 Hours of Service for each semi-monthly payroll period or partial semi-monthly payroll period
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 190 Hours of Service for each month or partial month
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The hours equivalency shall apply to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Only Employees not paid on a per-hour basis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The following modifications shall be made to the requirements specified in B.13a-c:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	B.13c will not apply if B.13b.i is selected (&#147;None&#148;).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The responses to B.13 are used only to the extent that the Plan determines eligibility service by the Hour of Service method and will apply uniformly to B.10, wherever Hours of Service is elected unless otherwise provided in B.13d.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If B.13d is selected, the modifications must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion. For example, B.13d could be used to restrict the Accounts where Eligibility Computation Periods switch to the Plan Year.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;C. CONTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Elective - Allocation Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#160; An Eligible Employee who has met the requirements of Section&nbsp;B and who has satisfied the following requirements shall be eligible to receive an allocation of Non-Elective Contributions during the applicable Plan Year.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation Service Requirements for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In order to share in the allocation of Non-Elective Contributions, a Participant is required to complete the following Hours of Service in the applicable Plan Year
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In order to share in the allocation of Non-Elective Contributions, a Participant is required to be employed by the Employer on the last day of Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In order to share in the allocation of Non-Elective Contributions, a Participant is required to be employed by the Employer on the last day of Plan Year or complete at least
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Hours of Service in the applicable Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.1a and C.1b are inapplicable if C.1c is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.1a and C.1c may not be more than 1,000.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Elective Allocation Service Computation Rules
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Select hours equivalency:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	An Employee shall be credited with the following service with the Employer:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 10 Hours of Service for each day or partial day
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 45 Hours of Service for each week or partial week
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 95 Hours of Service for each semi-monthly payroll period or partial semi-monthly payroll period
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 190 Hours of Service for each month or partial month
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The hours equivalency shall apply to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Only Employees not paid on a per-hour basis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.2 is only applicable if C.1a or C.1c is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exceptions to Allocation Service Requirements for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Modify Hour of Service requirement and/or last day requirement for a Participant who terminates employment with the Employer during the Plan Year due to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; death.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-05_PB_7_041639_5335">
