<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;D. VESTING
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Disability
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; attainment of Normal Retirement Date
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Any Hour of Service requirement and last day requirement shall be modified as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Waive both the Hour of Service requirement and last day requirement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Waive the Hour of Service requirement only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Waive last day requirement only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The following other modifications shall be made to the requirements specified in C.1-3b:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.3 is only applicable if C.1a, C.1b or C.1c is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.3c may only be used to make minor changes to the requirements specified in C.1-3b and must be specified in a manner that is objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion. For example, C.3c could be used to clarify that last day but not Hours of Service is waived for death while Hours of Service and last day are waived for Disability and attainment of Normal Retirement Age.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Coverage Failures for Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Method to fix Non-Elective Contribution Code section 410(b)&nbsp;ratio percentage coverage failures (Section&nbsp;4.03(d)):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Do not automatically fix
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Add just enough Participants to meet the coverage requirements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Add all non-excludable Participants
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Elective - Formula
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Elective allocation formula.&#160; See Section&nbsp;4.01(b)&nbsp;of the BPD.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation of Non-Elective Contributions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Non-Elective Contributions are allocated to Participant Accounts at the following time(s):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; End of Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Semi-annually
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Quarterly
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Each calendar month
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Each pay period
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Minimum and Maximum Non-Elective Allocations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allocations of Non-Elective Contributions for a Participant shall be subject to a minimum amount:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allocations of Non-Elective Contributions for a Participant shall be subject to a maximum amount:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Any service requirements specified in C.1 through C.3 shall be applied pro rata to the period selected in this C.6a. Any last day rule&nbsp;specified in C.1 through C.3 shall be applied as of the end of each period selected in this C.6a.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Elective - Disability
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allocate Non-Elective Contributions to Disabled Participants who do not meet the allocation service requirements (Section&nbsp;4.01(e)). Allocations to Disabled Participants end as of the earliest of: (i)&nbsp;the last day of the Plan Year in which occurs the
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	anniversary of the start of the Participant&#146;s Disability or (ii)&nbsp;such other time specified in Section&nbsp;4.01(e).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.7 shall not be more than &#147;tenth&#148;.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Allocations under C.7 may occur after Termination.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Death or Disability During Qualified Military Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; For benefit accrual purposes, a Participant that dies or becomes Disabled while performing qualified military service will be treated as if he had been employed by the Employer on the day preceding death or Disability and terminated employment on the day of death or Disability (Section&nbsp;4.04).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Prevailing Wage
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In addition to any other Non-Elective Contributions otherwise provided in the Plan, an amount necessary to meet the Employer&#146;s requirements under an applicable prevailing wage statute shall be allocated.&#160; The formula for allocating Non-Elective Contributions shall be specified in the Prevailing Wage Addendum to the Adoption Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The prevailing wage allocation offset:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The prevailing wage allocations will offset any other Non-Elective Contribution allocations that would otherwise be made to a Participant
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Qualified Non-Elective Contributions (in addition to any non-elective contribution made pursuant to C.5 and Section&nbsp;4.01) shall be allocated in an amount necessary to meet the Employer&#146;s requirements under an applicable prevailing wage statute. Allocations will be
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-05_PB_8_041920_5796">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage24"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;D. VESTING
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	made in an amount necessary to meet the Employer&#146;s requirements under an applicable prevailing wage statute.&#160; The formula for allocating Qualified Non-Elective Contributions shall be specified in an Addendum to the Adoption Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The prevailing wage allocation offset:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The prevailing wage allocations will offset any other Qualified Non-elective Contribution allocations that would otherwise be made to a Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	from receiving benefits under an applicable prevailing wage statute under this Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Depending upon the offset rule&nbsp;chosen, timing of allocations may need to be considered as contributions under Prevailing Wage are typically required to be made not less often than quarterly.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The offset provided under C.9a.iii and/or C.9b.iii must be objectively determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to Employer discretion
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	C.9c must be used to exclude Highly Compensated Employees or another nondiscriminatory class of employees from receiving Prevailing Wage allocations. Note that the Employees excluded will generally still need to be provided the Prevailing Wage benefits in another manner.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	QNECs
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The following limitations, conditions and/or special rules&nbsp;apply to Qualified Non-Elective Contributions:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(Section&nbsp;4.01(b))
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Subject to C.10 if applicable, the Employer&#146;s Qualified Non-elective Contribution shall be allocated in such manner as determined by the Company. The Company shall notify the Plan Administrator and/or the Trustee in writing of the manner in which such contributions shall be allocated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A Qualified Non-elective Contribution of a Nonhighly Compensated Employee will not be taken into account in satisfying the requirements of Section&nbsp;5.02 to the extent it is a disproportionate contribution within the meaning of Treas. Reg. sections 1.401(k)-2(a)(6)(iv)&nbsp;and/or 1.401(m)-2(a)(6)(v).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rollovers
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Rollover Contributions are permitted (Section&nbsp;4.02):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; No
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - All Eligible Employees may make a Rollover Contribution even if not yet a Participant in the Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - Only active Participants may make a Rollover Contribution
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes -
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	may make a Rollover Contribution
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The Plan Administrator has discretion under Section&nbsp;4.02 to limit the types of rollover contributions accepted by the Plan and must use that discretion in a consistent and nondiscriminatory manner.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	415 Additional Language
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Additional language necessary to satisfy Code section 415 because of the required aggregation of multiple plans:
<U>
	Maximum Annual Additions will be limited under this plan if exceeded by combining the total Annual Additions from this Plan and any other Defined Contribution Plan sponsored by the Employer.
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Service Rules
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting service computation method
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Hours of Service. Number of Hours of Service necessary for a Year of Vesting Service:
<U>
	1000
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Elapsed Time
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Unless D.1.b (Elapsed Time) is selected, the Plan will use the Hours of Service method for determining vesting service.&#160; If D.1.b (Elapsed Time) is selected, questions D.2 through D.3 are disregarded.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	D.1a may not be more than 1,000.&#160; If left blank, the Plan will use 1,000 Hours of Service.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Service Equivalencies
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Select equivalency for vesting purposes:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	An Employee shall be credited with the following service with the Employer:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 10 Hours of Service for each day or partial day
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 45 Hours of Service for each week or partial week
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 95 Hours of Service for each semi-monthly payroll period or partial semi-monthly payroll period
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; 190 Hours of Service for each month or partial month
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The hours equivalency selected in D.2a shall apply to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Employees
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;D. VESTING
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Only Employees not paid on a per-hour basis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	D.2b does not apply if D.2a.i is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Computation Period
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Calendar year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The twelve-consecutive month period commencing on the date the Employee first performs an Hour of Service; each subsequent twelve-consecutive month period shall commence on the anniversary of such date
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	D.3d must be a twelve-consecutive month period.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Employer Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Count years of service with employers other than the Employer for vesting purposes. List other employers and indicate for what purposes (e.g., Non-Elective,&nbsp;etc.) the service applies along with any limitations:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Exceptions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160;Death. Provide for full vesting for a Participant who terminates employment with the Employer due to death while an Employee (Section&nbsp;6.02).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Disability. Provide for full vesting for a Participant who terminates employment with the Employer due to Disability while an Employee (Section&nbsp;6.02).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Early Retirement. Provide for 100% vesting upon the attainment of Early Retirement Date while an Employee (Section&nbsp;6.02).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Exclusions
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude Years of Vesting Service earned before age 18
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude Years of Vesting Service earned before the Employer maintained this Plan or a predecessor plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; One-year holdout.&#160; If an Employee has a One-Year Break in Service/Period of Severance, exclude Years of Vesting Service earned before such period until the Employee has completed a Year of Vesting Service after returning to employment with the Employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Rule&nbsp;of parity.&#160; If an Employee does not have any nonforfeitable right to the Account balance derived from Employer contributions, exclude Years of Vesting Service earned before a period of five (5)&nbsp;consecutive One-Year Breaks in Service/Periods of Severance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.
</FONT>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Other Non-Elective Schedule - 4 years but less than 5 years:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	vi.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Other Non-Elective Schedule - 5 years but less than 6 years:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	vii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Other Non-Elective Schedule - 6 or more years: 100%.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See Section&nbsp;6.02 for definitions of the applicable vesting schedules.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Any vesting schedule described in E.8g must provide vesting at least as rapidly as the &#147;3 Year Cliff&#148; vesting schedule or the &#147;2-6 Year Graded&#148; vesting schedule and D.8f.vii will be deemed to be 100%.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	Other Vesting Schedule
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	&#160; The Plan has another vesting schedule:

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	c.

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;D. VESTING
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The vesting schedule in D.9 is in addition to the vesting schedules in D.8
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	D.9b must be applied in a consistent and nondiscriminatory manner. For example, D.9b could be used to describe a prior vesting schedule, vesting for a transfer account, or a vesting schedule that applies to Participants covered by a collective bargaining agreement provided retirement benefits were the subject of good faith bargaining.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#160; The vesting schedule must satisfy the applicable minimum vesting requirements of Code section 411(a)(2)&nbsp;at every point in time, for all Participants&#146; years of service.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forfeitures
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Forfeitures will be used in the following manner (Articles 5 and 6):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Any permissible method (restore forfeitures, reduce Employer contributions (or reallocate as Employer contributions) made pursuant to Article&nbsp;4 or to pay Plan expenses)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	D.10b is limited to one or a combination of the options described in D.10a. D.10b may be used to further restrict the uses of forfeiture and must be applied in a consistent and nondiscriminatory manner.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;E. DISTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

</FONT>
</B>

	&#160; Attainment of age
<U>
	65
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160; Later of attainment of age
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	and the service specified in E.1b
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	Select the type and length of service used to measure Normal Retirement Age:

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160; Eligibility.
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Years of Eligibility Service
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Vesting.
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Years of Vesting Service
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

	anniversary of participation (e.g. third, fourth,&nbsp;etc.)

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	Normal Retirement Date means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	&#160; Normal Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	&#160; First day of calendar month coincident or next following Normal Retirement Age

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160; First day of calendar month nearest Normal Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160; Anniversary date nearest Normal Retirement Age

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The age entered in E.1a may not be more than 65.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.1b may not require more than the fifth anniversary of participation as defined in Treas. Reg. section 1.411(a)-7(b)(1)&nbsp;and any superseding guidance.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The Normal Retirement Age shall be deemed met no later than the later of age 65 or the fifth anniversary of participation as defined in Treas. Reg. section 1.411(a)-7(b)(1)&nbsp;and any superseding guidance.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Early Retirement
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Early Retirement Age means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None. The Plan does not have an early retirement feature.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Attainment of age
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Later of attainment of age
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	and the service specified in F.2b
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Select the type and length of service used to measure Early Retirement Age:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Eligibility.
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Years of Eligibility Service
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Vesting.
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	Years of Vesting Service
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Participation.
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	anniversary of participation (e.g. third, fourth,&nbsp;etc.)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Early Retirement Date means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ &#160;]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Early Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; First day of calendar month coincident or next following Early Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; First day of calendar month nearest Early Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Anniversary date nearest Early Retirement Age
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	v.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The age entered in E.2a may not be more than 65.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.2b is only applicable if E.2a.iii is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
