<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;E. DISTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See related selections D.5c (vesting upon Early Retirement Date) and F.2b (in-service distributions upon Early Retirement Date).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Time&nbsp;&amp; Form&nbsp;of Payment
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Unless E.10b is &#147;Yes&#148;, E.3 through E.5 shall only apply to Accounts other than those that comprise&#160; Participant&#146;s ESOP Accounts.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Time of Payment (Other than Death)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Immediate.&#160; As soon as administratively feasible with a final payment made consisting of any allocations occurring after such Termination of Employment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; End of Plan Year.&#160; As soon as administratively feasible after all contributions have been allocated relating to the Plan Year in which the Participant&#146;s Account balance becomes distributable
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Normal Retirement Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Any entry in E.3d must comply with Code section 401(a)(9), Section&nbsp;7.02(e)&nbsp;and other requirements of Article&nbsp;7.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Form&nbsp;of Payment (Other than Death)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Medium of distribution from the Plan:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Cash only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Cash or in-kind
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Cash or in-kind rollover to an Individual Retirement Account sponsored by the following vendor:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Default Form&nbsp;of Payment (Other than Death)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Unless otherwise elected by the Participant, distributions shall be made in the form of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Lump sum only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Qualified Joint and
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	% Survivor Annuity (not less than 50% and not more than 100%)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	In addition to the form described in E.5a, distributions from the Plan after Termination for reasons other than death may be made in the following forms (select all that apply):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Lump sum only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Lump sum payment or substantially equal annual, or more frequent installments over a period not to exceed the joint life expectancy of the Participant and his Beneficiary
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Under a continuous right of withdrawal pursuant to which a Participant may withdraw such amounts at such times as he shall elect
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.5b.iii and any entry in E.5b.iv must comply with Code section 401(a)(9), Section&nbsp;7.02(e)&nbsp;and other requirements of Article&nbsp;7.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Distributions as an Annuity
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Permit Participants to make distributions in the form of an annuity
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - entire account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - the following conditions and/or limitations shall apply:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; No
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.6a.i or E.6a.ii is selected, a Participant may elect to have the Plan Administrator apply his vested Account to the extent provided above toward the purchase of an annuity contract, which shall be distributed to the Participant.&#160; The terms of such annuity contract shall comply with the provisions of this Plan and any annuity contract shall be nontransferable.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.6b.i or E.6b.ii is selected, a Beneficiary may elect to have the Plan Administrator apply his vested Account to the extent provided above toward the purchase of an annuity contract, which shall be distributed to the Beneficiary.&#160; The terms of such annuity contract shall comply with the provisions of this Plan (including Section&nbsp;7.05) and any annuity contract shall be nontransferable.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.6a.ii and E.6b.ii must be applied in a consistent and nondiscriminatory manner (for example, limiting annuity distributions to accounts in excess of a certain dollar amount.)
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transfer from Pension Plan
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The Plan has received a transfer of assets from a plan subject to the survivor annuity rules&nbsp;of Code sections 411(a)(11) and 417 (e.g., a money purchase or defined benefit plan).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Payments on Death
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Beneficiary Designation
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	To the extent that a Participant&#146;s Account is subject to the survivor annuity rules&nbsp;of Section&nbsp;7.10, the spouse of a married Participant shall be the beneficiary of
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	% of such Participant&#146;s Account unless the spouse waives his or her rights to such benefit pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.10 (Section&nbsp;7.04).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.8 may not be less than 50%.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	12
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-07_PB_12_051639_7748">
</A>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage27"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;E. DISTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.8 only applies to Accounts subject to the survivor annuity requirements of Section&nbsp;7.10.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Payment upon Participant&#146;s Death
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Distributions on account of the death of the Participant shall be made in accordance with the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Pay entire Account balance by end of fifth year for all Beneficiaries in accordance with Sections 7.02(b)(1)(A)&nbsp;and 7.02(b)(2)(A)&nbsp;only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Pay entire Account balance no later than the 60th day following the end of Plan Year in which the Participant dies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allow extended payments for all beneficiaries in accordance with Sections 7.02(b)(1)(A), (B)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;and 7.02(b)(2)(A)&nbsp;and (B)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Pay entire Account balance by end of fifth year for Beneficiaries in accordance with Sections 7.02(b)(1)(A)&nbsp;and 7.02(b)(2)(A)&nbsp;and allow extended payments in accordance with Sections 7.02(b)(1)(B)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;and 7.02(b)(2)(B)&nbsp;only if the Participant&#146;s spouse is the Participant&#146;s sole primary Beneficiary
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	e.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">

</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.11a.ii (Other) is selected, death benefits when there is no designated beneficiary shall be provided pursuant to F.11a.ii. The death benefits described must be definitely determinable and may not be specified in a manner that is subject to discretion.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.11c.i is selected, E.11d does not apply.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.11d is selected, the modifications must be nondiscriminatory and definitely determinable.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Domestic Partners shall not be treated as a spouse under the following Sections of the Plan: 7.02(b)&nbsp;(distribution upon death), 7.05 (minimum distributions) and 7.06 (direct rollovers).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If revocation is selected (E.11b) you may use this item to indicate automatic revocation upon divorce.
</FONT>
</I>

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cash Out
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:2.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Involuntary cash-out amount for purposes of Section&nbsp;7.03: $
<U>
	1000
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Minimum Account balance for Qualified Joint and Survivor Annuity consent requirements (Section&nbsp;7.10): $
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;E. DISTRIBUTIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Involuntary cash-out of a terminated Participant&#146;s Account balance when it exceeds the cash-out amount specified in E.10a is deferred under Section&nbsp;7.03(b)&nbsp;until:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Later of age 62 or Normal Retirement Date - payment made in a lump sum only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Required Beginning Date - Participant may elect payment in a lump sum or installments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Required Beginning Date - payment made in a lump sum only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Exclude amounts attributable to Rollover Contributions in determining the value of the Participant&#146;s nonforfeitable account balance for purposes of the Plan&#146;s Involuntary Cash out Rules&nbsp;(Sections 7.03 and 7.10)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.12a and E.12b have a $5,000 maximum, $5,000 will be entered unless otherwise specified.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.12a is not selected and E.10b is zero, E.10d does not apply.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	E.12b only applies to Accounts subject to the survivor annuity requirements of Section&nbsp;7.10.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If E.12a is less than $1,000, E.12d may not be selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Any entry in E.12c.iv must comply with Code section 411(a)(11), Section&nbsp;7.03 and other requirements of Article&nbsp;7.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Required Beginning Date
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	13.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Required Beginning Date
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Required Beginning Date for a Participant other than a More Than 5% Owner:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Retirement.&#160; April&nbsp;1 of the calendar year following the later of the calendar year in which the Participant: (x)&nbsp;attains age 70-1/2, or (y)&nbsp;retires
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Age 70-1/2.&#160; April&nbsp;1 of the calendar year following the calendar year in which the Participant attains age 70-1/2
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Election.&#160; The option provided in E.13a; provided that a Participant may elect to commence distributions pursuant to either E.13a or E.13b
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	A Participant&#146;s Required Beginning Date is a protected benefit under Code section 411(d)(6).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;F. IN-SERVICE WITHDRAWALS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	See Section&nbsp;8.05 for limits on in-service distributions.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	In-service withdrawal options are meant as enabling rules. If an in-service distribution is permitted under any option specified below, the in-service withdrawal is permissible.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Status
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Vesting Status for In-service Withdrawals
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Select one:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In-service withdrawals otherwise permitted under Section&nbsp;G are allowed from Accounts that are partially vested
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; An Account must be fully vested for a Participant to receive an in-service withdrawal
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The response to F.1 will be ignored if the Plan does not allow in-service withdrawals.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Withdrawals under F.2-10 are only permitted from the portion of a Participant&#146;s Accounts described in F.1 unless otherwise specified in F.11.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Retirement/Hardship/Age
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Normal/Early Retirement
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allow in-service distributions after attainment of Normal Retirement Date (Section&nbsp;7.01(b)) from the following Accounts:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allow in-service distributions after attainment of Early Retirement Date (Section&nbsp;7.01(a)) from the following Accounts:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Hardship
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Hardship withdrawals are allowed as follows (Section&nbsp;8.01):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Accounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Selected Accounts
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non-Elective Contribution Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Rollover Contribution Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=163314,FOLIO='14',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-07_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 06:15 2016' -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;F. IN-SERVICE WITHDRAWALS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Transfer Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The criteria used in determining whether a Participant is entitled to receive a Hardship withdrawal:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Safe Harbor criteria set forth in Section&nbsp;8.01(b)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non Safe Harbor criteria set forth in Section&nbsp;8.01(c)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	e.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; More flexible Hardship criteria applies to permitted Account(s)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Use criteria specified in Section&nbsp;8.01(c)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Use criteria specified in Section&nbsp;8.01(c)&nbsp;with the following additional criteria and/or modifications:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	f.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Expand the Hardship criteria to include the Beneficiary of the Participant
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	g.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other limitations on Hardship withdrawals:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If F.3a is selected, F.3b through F.3g do not apply.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	F.3e only applies if Hardship withdrawals are permitted from Accounts not subject to Treas. Reg. 1.401(k)-1(d)&nbsp;(Accounts specified in F.3c.ii-iv to the extent applicable and selected above). If F.3e is selected, the requirements of Section&nbsp;8.01(b)(2)&nbsp;shall not apply, the amount of the hardship distribution may not exceed the Participant&#146;s vested interest under the applicable Account and the requirements of Revenue Ruling 71-224 and any superseding guidance shall apply.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	F.3f only applies if the Plan provides for in-service withdrawals on account of Hardship and uses the safe harbor criteria for Hardship determinations. If F.3f is selected, Hardship distributions may be made for a primary Beneficiary for expenses described in Treas. Reg. sections 1.401(k)-1(d)(3)(iii)(B)(1), (3), or (5)&nbsp;(relating to medical, tuition, and funeral expenses, respectively). A &#147;primary Beneficiary&#148; is an individual who is named as a Beneficiary under the Plan and has an unconditional right to all or a portion of the Participant&#146;s Account Balance upon the death of the Participant.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Specified Age and Service
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	In-service withdrawals are allowed on attainment of age
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	and
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	service (Section&nbsp;8.02):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Accounts
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Selected Accounts
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If Selected Accounts is selected, specified age and service withdrawals may be made from the following Accounts:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non-Elective Contribution Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Rollover Contribution Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Transfer Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160;Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	F.4b only applies if F.4a.iii is selected.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	5.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Specified Age
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	In-service withdrawals are allowed on attainment of age
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	(Section&nbsp;8.02):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non-Elective Contributions (Section&nbsp;8.03(a)).&#160; In-service withdrawals are allowed from a Participant&#146;s Non-Elective Contribution Account after
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	years of Participation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.

	[&#160; ]

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; ESOP Contributions.&#160; In-service withdrawals are allowed from a Participant&#146;s ESOP Account after
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	years of Participation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">

	a.

	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	years.

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;F. IN-SERVICE WITHDRAWALS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; ESOP Contributions (Section&nbsp;8.03(a)).&#160; In-service withdrawals are allowed from a Participant&#146;s ESOP Account on funds held for
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	F.7a-b may not be less than two.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	At Any Time (Section&nbsp;8.03(b))
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; In-service withdrawals are allowed from the Rollover Contribution Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transfer Account
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Permit a distribution to be made to a Participant who has attained age 62 and who has not separated from employment from the transfer Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - under any distribution option offered to a Terminated Participant
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Yes - limited to the following terms and conditions:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	F.9 only applies if E.7 is selected (Plan has received a transfer of assets from a plan subject to the survivor annuity rules&nbsp;of Code sections 401(a)(11) and 417).
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Disability
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Allow distributions upon Disability.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#160; A severe disability equivalent to A.20a is as follows: the Participant is unable to engage in any substantial gainful activity by reason of any medically determinable physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or which has lasted or can be expected to last for a continuous period of not less than 12 months. The permanence and degree of such impairment shall be supported by medical evidence.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conditions/Limitations
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Conditions/Limitations
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The following limitations, conditions and/or special rules&nbsp;apply to in-service withdrawals:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Unless otherwise specified, the limitations will apply to all in-service withdrawals (F.1 through F.10). F.11 must be applied in a consistent and nondiscriminatory manner. For example, F.11 could be used to specify the number of withdrawals permitted in a specified time period. See Section&nbsp;8.05.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Loans
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Loans
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Loans are permitted:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>

<B>

</FONT>
</U>
</B>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Plan Operations
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Permitted Investments
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Plan may invest up to 100% of the Trust Fund in &#147;qualifying employer securities&#148; and &#147;qualifying employer real property&#148; (Section&nbsp;9.04)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160; Plan may invest assets other than ESOP Accounts in life insurance (Section&nbsp;9.11)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If G.1a is selected, the selection shall not apply to Accounts prohibited from investing more than 10% of assets in &#147;qualifying employer securities&#148; and &#147;qualifying employer real property&#148; under section 407(b)(2)&nbsp;of ERISA.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Plan may invest in qualifying longevity annuity contracts (&#147;QLACs&#148;)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The date the QLAC option will first be available under the Plan
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Indicate the extent to which terminated Participants shall be subject to the Reshuffling provisions of Section&nbsp;7.02(d)(5):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Redemption. Employer Stock held in a terminated Participant&#146;s ESOP Account shall be redeemed for assets other than Employer Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Transfer. Employer Stock held in a terminated Participant&#146;s ESOP Account shall be transferred to other Participant Accounts where it will be redeemed for assets other than Employer Stock held in that Account
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; None.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	4.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Reshuffling provisions. Indicate: (i)&nbsp;when such redemption/transfer shall occur, (ii)&nbsp;the manner in which Employer stock will be valued, and (iii)&nbsp;the method used to determine how many shares of Employer Stock shall be redeemed/transferred and to which Participant Accounts the
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</I>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Employer Stock shall be transferred:
<U>
	Transfer shall occur when distributions are made in the form of cash. Stock shares shall be transferred into all participant accounts at the value as of the distribution election date so that enough cash is available to make termination distribution
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
