</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	c.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Participants may also establish individual brokerage accounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	d.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Participants may exercise voting rights with respect to the assets held in Accounts other than ESOP Accounts (Section&nbsp;9.06(a)):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Employer stock only
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All investments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	iii.
</FONT>
</B>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<B>

	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>

	&#160; Selected investments:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If G.7a.iii (None) is selected, G.7b through G.7d do not apply.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>

</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">

</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If G.1a is selected (employer securities) and G.7a.i or G.7a.ii (404(c)&nbsp;applies) is selected, then voting rights must be selected in G.7d.i, G.7d.ii or G.2d.iii.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	9.

</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>

	&#160; Last day of Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	b.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[ X ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Other:&#160;
<U>
	Each business day. Stock shares for distributions will be valued as of the date the participant&#146;s election form is received or, if the shares were sold on the open market, the value at which the shares were sold, net of commissions. If no election is received and an automatic distribution is made because the value of the Participant&#146;s account is $1,000 or less, then the value assigned a share of stock shall be the closing price as of the last business day of the month in the quarter in which the distribution is made.
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">

<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;G. PLAN OPERATIONS AND TOP-HEAVY
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>

	NOTE:

</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If a separate trust agreement is to be used (G.12a.ii or G.12a.iii is selected), the items in G.1-5 shall apply only to the extent that they are not superseded by the terms of the separate trust agreement.&#160; Only the trust document(s)&nbsp;previously approved by the IRS may be utilized with this Plan and still rely on the Plan&#146;s advisory letter.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If G.12a.i or G.12a.iii (use trust in Basic Plan Document) is selected and G.12c.ii (no indemnification) is selected, indemnification for the Trustee may be pursuant to an agreement that is not a part of the Plan.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If G.12c.ii (no indemnification) Section&nbsp;10.07(b)&nbsp;shall not apply and indemnification for the Trustee may be pursuant to an agreement that is not a part of the Plan.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	G.12f must be an individual or a corporation with trust powers and is intended to comply with FAB 2008-01.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

	&#160; The following modifications are made to the permitted investments under the Trust Fund:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

</U>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>

	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The addition of language in G.13 cannot conflict with other provisions of the Plan and cannot cause the Plan to fail to qualify under Code section 401(a). Under no circumstances can a modification consist of: 1) removal or change to the prudent man rule, 2) addition of arbitration for Participant disputes, 3) addition of securities lending program, and 4) modification of the duties of the special trustee in Section&nbsp;10.02(b)&nbsp;to determine and collect contributions under the Plan.
</FONT>
</I>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="4" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:13.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	14.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Statute of Limitations
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; The Plan has a contractual statute of limitations as follows:
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTE:
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The statute of limitations must not be unreasonably short (See Heimeshoff v. Hartford Life Ins. Co., U.S., No.&nbsp;12-729 (2013))
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	15.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Top-Heavy allocations are made to
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	a.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; This Plan.&#160; Participants who share in Top-Heavy minimum allocations:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	i.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; Non-Key only.&#160; Any Participant who is employed by the Employer on the last day of the Plan Year and is not a Key Employee
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ii.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	[&#160; ]
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#160; All Participants.&#160; Any Participant who is employed by the Employer on the last day of the Plan Year
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<B>

</FONT>

	&#160; Participants covered by a collective bargaining agreement will share in Top-Heavy minimum allocations provided retirement benefits were the subject of good faith bargaining.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">

</I>
</B>

</FONT>
</I>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;">

</FONT>
</I>
</B>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	c.

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="91%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:91.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN 2.0PT 17.3PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.1PT;">

	Section&nbsp;14.08 &nbsp;&nbsp;Gender and Number
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;1 INTRODUCTION
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;1 INTRODUCTION
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.01
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	PLAN AND TRUST
</FONT>
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	This document (&#147;Basic Plan Document&#148;) and its related Adoption Agreement are intended to qualify as a tax-exempt plan and trust under Code sections 401(a)&nbsp;and 501(a), respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.02
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN
</FONT>
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The Plan and the Accounts specified in the Adoption Agreement as the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) Accounts and the applicable portion of the Trust are also intended to qualify as a tax-exempt ESOP and trust under Code section 4975(e)(7). The Accounts specified in the Adoption Agreement as the ESOP Accounts of the Plan shall be invested primarily in Employer Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.03
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	APPLICATION OF PLAN AND TRUST
</FONT>
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Except as otherwise specifically provided herein, the provisions of this Plan shall apply to those individuals who are Eligible Employees of the Company on or after the Effective Date.&#160; Except as otherwise specifically provided for herein, the rights and benefits, if any, of former Eligible Employees of the Company whose employment terminated prior to the Effective Date, shall be determined under the provisions of the Plan, as in effect from time to time prior to that date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">

<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-15_PB_I_071414_6581">

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	1

<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Account
</U>
	&#148; means the balance of a Participant&#146;s interest in the Trust Fund as of the applicable date as adjusted pursuant to Article&nbsp;9. &#147;Account&#148; or &#147;Accounts&#148; shall include to the extent provided in the Adoption Agreement, Non-Elective Contribution Account, Rollover Contribution Account, Transfer Account and such other account(s)&nbsp;or subaccount(s)&nbsp;as the Plan Administrator, in its discretion, deems appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Adoption Agreement
</U>
	&#148; means the document executed in conjunction with this Basic Plan Document that contains the optional features selected by the Plan Sponsor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Alternate Payee
</U>
	&#148; means the person entitled to receive payment of benefits under the Plan pursuant to a Qualified Domestic Relations Order.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Annual Addition
</U>
	&#148; means the sum of the following amounts credited to a Participant&#146;s Account for the Limitation Year:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Employer contributions allocated to a Participant&#146;s Account Non-Elective Contributions.&#160; Employer contributions shall also include;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	after-tax contributions;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	forfeitures;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	amounts allocated, after March&nbsp;31, 1984, to an individual medical account, as defined in Code section 415(l)(2), which is part of a pension or annuity plan maintained by the Employer;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	amounts derived from contributions paid or accrued after December&nbsp;31, 1985, in taxable years ending after such date, which are attributable to post-retirement medical benefits, allocated to the separate account of a key employee, as defined in Code section 419A(d)(3), under a welfare benefit fund, as defined in Code section 419(e), maintained by the Employer; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	allocations under a simplified employee pension plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, an Annual Addition shall not include a restorative payment within the meaning of IRS Revenue Ruling 2002-45 and any superseding guidance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Annuity Starting Date
</U>
	&#148; means the first day of the first period for which an amount is paid as an annuity or any other form.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Applicable Plan
</U>
	&#148; means a plan that is established and maintained by: (i)&nbsp;an employer whose charter or bylaws restrict the ownership of substantially all outstanding employer securities to employees or to a trust described in Code section 401(a), (ii)&nbsp;an S Corporation, or (iii)&nbsp;a bank (as defined in Code section 581) which is prohibited by law from redeeming or purchasing its own securities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Beneficiary
</U>
	&#148; means the person(s)&nbsp;entitled to receive benefits, under Section&nbsp;7.04 of the Plan, upon the Participant&#146;s death.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Board
</U>
	&#148; means the governing body of the Plan Sponsor.&#160; If the Plan Sponsor is a sole proprietorship, the Board means the sole proprietor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Code
</U>
	&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Committee
</U>
	&#148; means the Committee that may be appointed by the Plan Sponsor pursuant to Section&nbsp;12.01 to serve as Plan Administrator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Company
</U>
	&#148; means the Plan Sponsor and any other entity that has adopted the Plan with the approval of the Plan Sponsor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Compensation
</U>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in the Adoption Agreement.&#160; To the extent provided in the Adoption Agreement, amounts not includible in gross income under Code section 125 shall include any amounts not available to a Participant in cash in lieu of group health coverage because the Participant is unable to certify that he or she has other health coverage (&#147;deemed Code section 125 compensation&#148;). An amount
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	CCH INCORPORATED, DBA FTWILLIAM.COM
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="20%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:20.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-15_PB_2_072848_5796">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="33%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:33.34%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">

	Copyright &#169; 2002-2016
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=28,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=458299,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-15_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:35 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage37"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	will be treated as an amount under Code section 125 only if the Company does not request or collect information regarding the Participant&#146;s other health coverage as part of the enrollment process for the health plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Compensation shall include other compensation paid by the later of: (a)&nbsp;2-1/2 months after an Employee&#146;s severance from employment with the Company or (b)&nbsp;the end of the Limitation Year that includes the date of the Employee&#146;s severance from employment with the Company if: (1)&nbsp;the payment is regular compensation for services during the Participant&#146;s regular working hours, or compensation for services outside the Participant&#146;s regular working hours (e.g., overtime or shift differential), commissions, bonuses, or other similar payments; and (2)&nbsp;the payment would have been paid to the Participant prior to a severance from employment if the Participant had continued in employment with the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The exclusions from Compensation for payments after severance from employment do not apply to payments to a Participant who does not currently perform services for the Company by reason of Qualified Military Service to the extent those payments do not exceed the amounts the Participant would have received if the individual had continued to perform services for the Company rather than entering Qualified Military Service. To the extent selected in the Adoption Agreement and pursuant to Code section 414(u)(12),&nbsp;IRS Notice 2010-15 and any superseding guidance, differential wage payments shall be treated as Compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	To the extent provided in Section&nbsp;4.01(e), Compensation shall include compensation paid to a Participant who is permanently and totally disabled.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Compensation must be determined without regard to any rules&nbsp;under Code section 3401(a)&nbsp;that limit the remuneration included in wages based on the nature or location of the employment or the services performed (such as the exception for agricultural labor in Code section 3401(a)(2)).&#160; For any Self-Employed Individual covered under the Plan, Compensation will mean Earned Income.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	For any Plan Year, the annual compensation of each Participant taken into account in determining allocations for any Plan Year beginning after December&nbsp;31, 2001, shall not exceed $200,000, as adjusted for cost-of-living increases in accordance with Code section 401(a)(17)(B).&#160; Annual compensation means Compensation during the Plan Year or such other consecutive 12-month period over which Compensation is otherwise determined under the Plan (the determination period).&#160; The cost-of-living adjustment in effect for a calendar year applies to annual compensation for the determination period that begins with or within such calendar year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If a determination period consists of fewer than 12 months, the annual Compensation limit is an amount equal to the otherwise applicable annual Compensation limit multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is the number of months in the short determination period, and the denominator of which is 12.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Deemed-Owned Shares
</U>
	&#148; means, with respect to any person:&#160; (i)&nbsp;the stock in the S Corporation constituting employer securities of an employee stock ownership plan which is allocated to such person under the Plan, and; (ii)&nbsp;such person&#146;s share of the stock in such corporation which is held by the Plan but which is not allocated under the Plan to Participants or Beneficiaries. For purposes of clause (ii)&nbsp;of the preceding sentence, a person&#146;s share of unallocated S corporation stock held by the Plan is the amount of the unallocated stock which would be allocated to such person if the unallocated stock were allocated to all Participants in the same proportions as the most recent stock allocation under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Determination Date
</U>
	&#148; means the last day of the preceding Plan Year.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Determination Date for the first Plan Year shall be the last day of such year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Disabled
</U>
	&#148; or &#147;
<U>
	Disability
</U>
	&#148; shall have the meaning specified in the Adoption Agreement.&#160; The determination of Disability shall be made by the Plan Administrator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Disqualified Person
</U>
	&#148; means a person defined in Code section 4975(e)(2), including but not limited to (i)&nbsp;a fiduciary of the Plan; (ii)&nbsp;a person providing services to the Plan; (iii)&nbsp;the Employer; (iv)&nbsp;an owner of 50% or more of the combined voting power or value of all classes of stock of the Plan Sponsor entitled to vote or the total value of shares of all classes of stock of the Plan Sponsor and certain members of such owner&#146;s family; or (v)&nbsp;an officer, director, 10% or greater shareholder or highly compensated employee (who earns 10% or more of the yearly wages) of the Employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Diversification Election Period
</U>
	&#148; means the six Plan Years beginning with the Plan Year during which a Participant becomes a Qualified Participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	CCH INCORPORATED, DBA FTWILLIAM.COM
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="20%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:20.0%;">

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	3
</FONT>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=29,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=628935,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-15_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:35 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage38"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Domestic Partner
</U>
	&#148; means, unless otherwise specified in the Adoption Agreement, a partner of the Participant if the Participant is in a civil union or similar relationship recognized under the laws of any state. A Participant may only have one Domestic Partner. A Participant may not have a Domestic Partner if the Participant is legally married to a person. If Domestic Partners are treated as a spouse under this Plan, Section&nbsp;7.10 applies and a Domestic Partner instead of a spouse is the Beneficiary of the survivor annuity, the term &#147;Qualified Joint and Survivor Annuity&#148; shall be modified to &#147;Joint and Survivor Annuity&#148;, &#147;qualified preretirement survivor annuity&#148; shall be modified to &#147;preretirement survivor annuity&#148;, and Qualified Optional Survivor Annuity&#148; shall be modified to &#147;Optional Survivor Annuity&#148;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Earned Income
</U>
	&#148; means the net earnings from self-employment in the trade or business with respect to which the Plan is established, for which personal services of the individual are a material income-producing factor.&#160; Net earnings will be determined without regard to items not included in gross income and the deductions allocable to such items.&#160; Net earnings are reduced by contributions by the Employer to a qualified plan to the extent deductible under Code section 404.&#160; Net earnings shall be determined with regard to the deduction allowed to the taxpayer by Code section 164(f)&nbsp;for taxable years beginning after December&nbsp;31, 1989.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Effective Date
</U>
	&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;A.3 of the Adoption Agreement except as otherwise specified in the Plan or Adoption Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Eligibility Computation Period
</U>
	&#148; means a 12-consecutive month period beginning with an Employee&#146;s Employment Commencement Date and each anniversary thereof.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, if the Adoption Agreement provides that the Eligibility Computation Period switches to the Plan Year his succeeding Eligibility Computation Period for such purpose will switch to the Plan Year, beginning with the Plan Year that includes the first anniversary of his Employment Commencement Date.&#160; If the Eligibility Computation Period switches to the Plan Year, an Employee who is credited with a Year of Eligibility Service in both the initial Eligibility Computation Period and the first Plan Year which commences prior to the first anniversary of the Employee&#146;s initial Eligibility Computation Period will be credited with two Years of Eligibility Service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Eligible Employee
</U>
	&#148; means any Employee employed by the Company, subject to the modifications and exclusions described in the Adoption Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If an individual is subsequently reclassified as, or determined to be, an Employee by a court, the Internal Revenue Service or any other governmental agency or authority, or if the Company is required to reclassify such individual as an Employee as a result of such reclassification or determination (including any reclassification by the Company in settlement of any claim or action relating to such individual&#146;s employment status), such individual shall not become an Eligible Employee by reason of such reclassification or determination.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	An individual who becomes employed by the Employer in a transaction between the Employer and another entity that is a stock or asset acquisition, merger, or other similar transaction involving a change in the employer of the employees of the trade or business shall not become eligible to participate in the Plan until the Plan Sponsor specifically authorizes such participation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Employee
</U>
	&#148; means any individual who is employed by the Employer, including a Self-Employed Individual. The term &#147;Employee&#148; includes any Leased Employee of the Employer.&#160; No Leased Employee may become a Participant hereunder unless he becomes an Eligible Employee.&#160; The term &#147;Employee&#148; shall not include a person who is classified by the Employer as an independent contractor or a person (other than a Self-Employed Individual) who is not treated as an employee for purposes of withholding federal employment taxes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Employer
</U>
	&#148; means the Company or any other employer that is a member of the same controlled group of corporations as the Employer within the meaning of Code section 1563(a)&nbsp;(as modified by subparagraphs (B)&nbsp;and (C)&nbsp;of Code section 409(l)(4)&nbsp;and as determined without regard to sections 1563(a)(4)&nbsp;and 1563(e)(C).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Employer Stock
</U>
	&#148; means the securities issued by the Employer that qualifies as employer securities within the meaning of Code section 409(l).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Common stock of the employer which is (publically traded) readily tradable on an established securities market; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	In a privately held company, it is the class of common stock with the greatest voting power and greatest dividend rights.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Employer Stock Fund
</U>
	&#148; means the Investment Fund which is invested primarily in Employer Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Employment Commencement Date
</U>
	&#148; means the first date on which the Eligible Employee performs an Hour of Service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	CCH INCORPORATED, DBA FTWILLIAM.COM
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="20%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:20.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-15_PB_4_073003_7748">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="33%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:33.34%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">

	Copyright &#169; 2002-2016
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=30,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=576387,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-15_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:35 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage39"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	ERISA
</U>
	&#148; means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, all amendments thereto and all federal regulations promulgated pursuant thereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	ESOP Accounts
</U>
	&#148; means those Accounts specified in Section&nbsp;1.02 and the Adoption Agreement as the ESOP portion of the Plan.&#160; The ESOP Accounts shall be invested in the Employer Stock Fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Exempt Loan
</U>
	&#148; means an extension of credit to the Plan pursuant to Article&nbsp;4A.02.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Highly Compensated Employee
</U>
	&#148; means, effective for Plan Years beginning after December&nbsp;31, 1996, any Employee who during the Plan Year performs services for the Employer and who:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	was a More Than 5% Owner at any time during the Plan Year or the preceding Plan Year; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	during the preceding Plan Year (the Adoption Agreement may provide that the foregoing determination may be made with respect to the calendar year beginning with or within the preceding Plan Year) received Statutory Compensation in excess of the Code section 414(q)(1)&nbsp;amount ($80,000 as adjusted) and unless otherwise provided in the Adoption Agreement was a member of the top paid group of Employees within the meaning of Code section 414(q)(3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The determination of who is a Highly Compensated Employee will be made in accordance with Code section 414(q)&nbsp;and the regulations thereunder to the extent they are not inconsistent with the method established above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	The term Highly Compensated Employee also includes a former Employee who was a Highly Compensated Employee when he separated from service or at any time after attaining age 55.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Hour of Service
</U>
	&#148; means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Each hour for which an Employee is paid, or entitled to payment, for the performance of duties for the Employer.&#160; These hours will be credited to the Employee for the computation period in which the duties are performed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Each hour for which an Employee is paid, or entitled to payment, by the Employer on account of a period of time during which no duties are performed (irrespective of whether the employment relationship has terminated) due to vacation, holiday, illness, incapacity (including disability), layoff, jury duty, military duty or leave of absence.&#160; No more than 501 Hours of Service will be credited under this paragraph for any single continuous period (whether or not such period occurs in a single computation period).&#160; Hours under this paragraph will be calculated and credited pursuant to DOL Reg. section 2530.200b-2 which is incorporated herein by this reference.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Each hour for which back pay, irrespective of mitigation of damages, is either awarded or agreed to by the Employer.&#160; The same Hours of Service will not be credited both under paragraph (a)&nbsp;or paragraph (b), as the case may be, and under this paragraph (c).&#160; These hours will be credited to the Employee for the computation period or periods to which the award or agreement pertains rather than the computation period in which the award, agreement or payment is made.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Solely for purposes of determining whether a One-Year Break in Service has occurred, an individual who is absent from work for maternity or paternity reasons shall receive credit for the Hours of Service which would otherwise have been credited to such individual but for such absence, or in any case in which such hours cannot be determined, 8 Hours of Service per day of such absence. For purposes of this paragraph, an absence from work for maternity or paternity reasons means an absence (1)&nbsp;by reason of the pregnancy of the individual, (2)&nbsp;by reason of a birth of a child of the individual, (3)&nbsp;by reason of the placement of a child with the individual in connection with the adoption of such child by such individual, or (4)&nbsp;for purposes of caring for such child for a period beginning immediately following such birth or placement.&#160; The Hours of Service credited under this paragraph shall be credited (1)&nbsp;in the computation period in which the absence begins if the crediting is necessary to prevent a break in service in that period, or (2)&nbsp;in all other cases, in the following computation period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If the Employer is a member of an affiliated service group (under Code section 414(m)), a controlled group of corporations (under Code section 414(b)), a group of trades or businesses under common control (under Code section 414(c)) or any other entity required to be aggregated with the Employer pursuant to Code section 414(o), service will be credited for any employment with such groups during the time the Employer is a member of the applicable group. Service will also be credited for any individual considered an Employee for purposes of this Plan under Code sections 414(n)&nbsp;or 414(o).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	CCH INCORPORATED, DBA FTWILLIAM.COM
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="20%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:20.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-15_PB_5_074018_141">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="33%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:33.34%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">

	Copyright &#169; 2002-2016
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=31,EFW="2227960",CP="BROADWAY FINANCIAL CORP.",DN="3",CHK=356467,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK125:[15ZCW2.15ZCW49802]23398-2-LA-15_ZCW49802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='MAR 24 13:35 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage40"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<I>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;2 DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	If the Employer maintains the plan of a predecessor employer, service with such employer will be treated as service for the Employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Service with respect to Qualified Military Service shall be credited in accordance with Code section 414(u)&nbsp;and service shall also be determined to the extent required by the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, for determining service under the elapsed time method an Hour of Service means each hour for which an Employee is paid or entitled to payment for the performance of duties for the Employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Impermissible Allocation
</U>
	&#148; means, any Annual Addition occurring during a Nonallocation Year to a S Corporation Disqualified Person under this Plan or any other plan of the Employer qualified under Code section 401(a).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Impermissible Accrual
</U>
	&#148; means, all Employer Stock consisting of shares in the S Corporation and all other Plan assets attributable to S Corporation shares held in a S Corporation Disqualified Person&#146;s Account for the benefit of that S Corporation Disqualified Person, regardless of whether such Impermissible Accrual is attributable to contributions in the current year or prior years Plan assets attributable to S Corporation stock held in a S Corporations Disqualified Person&#146;s Account include distributions made on such S Corporation stock within the meaning of Code section 1368, proceeds from the sale of such S Corporation stock, and earnings on such distributions or proceeds.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Investment Fiduciary
</U>
	&#148; means the person(s)&nbsp;designated in the Adoption Agreement.&#160; The fiduciary will be subject to standards of conduct as prescribed under ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Investment Funds
</U>
	&#148; means the funds, including the Employer Stock Fund, in which the Trust Fund is invested.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Investment Manager
</U>
	&#148; means an investment manager as described in section 3(38) of ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Key Employee
</U>
	&#148; means for Plan Years beginning after December&nbsp;31, 2001, any Employee or former Employee (including any deceased Employee) who, at any time during the Plan Year that includes the Determination Date, is an officer of the Employer having an annual Testing Compensation greater than $130,000 (as adjusted under Code section 416(i)(1)&nbsp;for Plan Years beginning after December&nbsp;31, 2002), a More Than 5% Owner of the Employer, or a 1-percent owner of the Employer having Testing Compensation of more than $150,000. In determining whether a plan is top-heavy for Plan Years beginning before January&nbsp;1, 2002, Key Employee means any Employee or former Employee (including any deceased Employee) who at any time during the 5-year period ending on the Determination Date, is an officer of the Employer having Testing Compensation that exceeds 50 percent of the dollar limitation under Code section 415(b)(1)(A), an owner (or considered an owner under Code section 318) of one of the ten largest interests in the Employer if such individual&#146;s Testing Compensation exceeds 100 percent of the dollar limitation under Code section 415(c)(1)(A), a More than 5% Owner of the Employer, or a 1-percent owner of the Employer who has Testing Compensation of more than $150,000. The determination of who is a Key Employee will be made in accordance with Code section 416(i)(1)&nbsp;and the applicable regulations and other guidance of general applicability issued thereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Leased Employee
</U>
	&#148; means any person (other than an Employee of the Employer) who pursuant to an agreement between the Employer and any other person (&#147;leasing organization&#148;) has performed services for the Employer (or for the Employer and related persons determined in accordance with Code section 414(n)(6)) on a substantially full time basis for a period of at least one year, and such services are performed under primary direction or control by the Employer. Contributions or benefits provided a Leased Employee by the leasing organization which are attributable to services performed for the Employer shall be treated as provided by the Employer.&#160; A person shall not be considered a Leased Employee if: (i)&nbsp;such person is covered by a money purchase pension plan providing: (1)&nbsp;a nonintegrated employer contribution rate of at least 10 percent of compensation, as defined in Code section 415(c)(3), but including amounts contributed pursuant to a salary reduction agreement which are excludable from the employee&#146;s gross income under Code sections 125, 402(e)(3), 402(h), 403(b), 132(f)&nbsp;or 457, (2)&nbsp;immediate participation, and (3)&nbsp;full and immediate vesting; and (ii)&nbsp;Leased Employees do not constitute more than 20 percent of the Employer&#146;s nonhighly compensated work force.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Leveraged Shares
</U>
	&#148; means shares of Employer Stock acquired by the Trustee with the proceeds of an Exempt Loan pursuant to Article&nbsp;4A.02.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	&#147;
<U>
	Limitation Year
</U>
	&#148; means the year specified in the Adoption Agreement for purposes of determining Annual Additions limits pursuant to Article&nbsp;5.&#160; All qualified plans maintained by the Employer must use the same Limitation Year.&#160; If the Limitation Year is amended to a different 12-consecutive month period, the new Limitation Year must begin on a date within the Limitation Year in which the amendment is made.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:46.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	CCH INCORPORATED, DBA FTWILLIAM.COM
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="20%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:20.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<A NAME="A2227960ZEX-10_1_HTM_23398-2-LA-15_PB_6_074259_7608">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="33%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:33.34%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:9.0PT;">
	Copyright &#169; 2002-2016
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
